name: Dungeon Balls
description:
Dungeon Balls is a multiplayer Co-Op game where you must explore a dungeon and defeat all enemies before defeating the final boss! There are loot chests spread across the dungeon with weapon upgrades to help you defeat enemies. The game can also be played in singleplayer.

NOTE: Discord must be installed and logged in for multiplayer to work. Singleplayer can still be played without Discord.
